title: Nomad Skybar
description: Situat la mansarda unei clƒÉdiri istorice din Centrul Vechi, Nomad te surprinde √Æn primul r√¢nd cu designul, pornind de la tavanul integral de sticlƒÉ, apoi decorul eclectic, cu mese joase »ôi tapi»õerii colorate. reviewObj.reviewBody: The place was overcrowded, no social distancing was possible, and waited for about 30 minutes for a simple food order.

O experienta foarte dezamagitoare. Am ajuns si ne-au dat masa deja,dupa 20 de minute ne-au gasit masa,dupa inca 20 de minute ne-au mutat la alta masa. Am stat o ora,am comandat,asteptam comanda si ni s-a zis ca trebuie sa plecam pentru ca vine urmatoarea rezervare. Ni se anulase comanda fara sa stim!!! Pentru ca voiau sa plecam,dupa o ora si ceva de stat acolo! Dupa au pus un grup intreg de oameni la masa noastra si deabea dupa ceva timp ne-au zis ca putem sa ramanem la masa. Foarte,foarte nepoliticosi!

reviewObj.reviewBody: Mancarea lasa putin de dorit dar daca vrei o cafea cu o priveliste misto e perfect!

reviewObj.reviewBody: Am fost impreuna cu iubitul meu si am avut o experienta foarte faina üòä Personalul a fost extrem de amabil (ne-au oferit la final si o portie de crochete cu telemea din partea casei), iar mancarea foarte foarte buna. Preferatele noastre au fost Doner Beignet si Potato Skins, dar va recomandam sa testati cat mai multe pana va gasiti si voi preferatele. Noi deja stim ce comandam data viitoare üòä Multumim!
E o placere sa revin aici! Mancare delicioasa si servire impecabila.

M√¢ncarea este o poveste √Æn sine. Tot ce »ôtiam clasic e reinterpretat aici. Totul are gust, savoare, aromele se √ÆmbinƒÉ perfect √Æn combina»õii surprinzƒÉtoare. Favoritul meu a fost un iaurt cu nuci prƒÉjite si susan negru, √Æmbl√¢nzit cu ulei infuzat cu mƒÉrar si boabe de coriandru. :) PoftƒÉ bunƒÉ!

Te a»ôteptam cu un meniu spectaculos »ôi o panoramƒÉ pe mƒÉsurƒÉ asupra √Æntregului ora»ô. Fork is the FUTURE of fine dining hospitality in Bucharest!+ VEZI MAI MULT

reviewObj.reviewBody: Nu am mai fost demult intr-un local in care atat mancarea cat si serviciile si atmosfera/aspectul restaurantului sa fie la nivel maxim. Am servit fructe de mare dar si friptura de miel si porc + desert. Imi este greu sa spun care au fost cele mai gustoase. Pot spune insa ca ma voi intoarce oricand cu placere la Fork in Ana Tower.
Delicious food, amazing view, nice service overall. I trully recommend!

title: Le Boutique - Food Concept Store
description: Le Boutique este un loc care reu»ôe»ôte sƒÉ √ÆmpleteascƒÉ armonios aerul boem provensal cu pofta de via»õƒÉ italianƒÉ »ôi savuroase note spaniole √Æntr-un meniu cu preparate mediteraneene complexe.

reviewObj.reviewBody: As fi drit sa va dau detalii despre mancare, atmosfera.... dar din pacate la "Le Boutique" nu sunt respectate rezervarile. Rezervarea a fost facuta pentru terasa dar cand am ajuns acolo ni s-a spus ca nu sunt locuri pe terasa pentru ca este un eveniment. Domnilor de la "Le Boutique" incercati sa va tratati clientii egal. Aveati nr.de telefon. Daca va dadeati putin interesul sunati si va cereati scuze si intrebati daca totusi dorim sa stam inauntru. Si am fi stat. Dar se pare, ca este prea greu....
Restaurantul are un design foarte drƒÉgu»õ, iar m√¢ncarea nu a dezamƒÉgit nici ea absolut deloc.

Localul este cochet si servirea este buna, insa nu l-as recomanda pentru faptul ca fumatorii nu sunt separati de nefumatori si de acest lucru nu afli decat atunci cand ajungi acolo. Fumatorilor li se permite sa fumeze in spatiul comun.
Very nice place, cute decoration, family/couple friendly, good prices and parking options around. Totally would recommend that!
Un loc foarte dragut si primitor. Personal foarte amabil. Mancarea buna. De recomandat.

reviewObj.reviewBody: Cu adevarat un loc inedit, descoperit din intamplare (si din fericire), unde am sa revin cu siguranta. Wok-ul cu vita, demential - must try!Terasa superba, atmosfera placuta si linistita, servirea ireprosabila.Big like, DaDa!

Totul la superlativ! O locatie potrivitƒÉ chiar »ôi in vremurile de pandemie »ôi unde doamnele iubitoare de frumos pot pleca »ôi cu un suvenir deosebit(https://dada.ro/ - pute»õi vedea modelele expuse in restaurant).

Toate lucrurile si toti oamenii de acolo de nota 10! Cu siguranta revenim!

title: RePlace. The Brunch Club
description: Positive vibes, specialty coffee, good spirits & street food When life gives you lemons, trade them for coffee

reviewObj.reviewBody: Totul la superlativ :)Mancarea si atmosfera foarte faineVom reveni cu drag si in viitoe.

One of the most peaceful and quiet coffee places I‚Äôve ever been to in Bucharest. Amazing coffee (they have, also, coffee for home), friendly staff and the service is great.The barista took the time to tell you about the coffee and the coffee itself was simply amazing. The food is not just good, is awesome!I highly recommended if you are looking for a place to drink a good coffee in a relaxing atmosphere and for a good brunch!You should visit --> RePlace.The Brunch Club‚òï
They serve very good coffee IMO, the terrace is cool and their staff is super friendly üëçI would recommend this place to anyone for a great coffee.Sursa: Google
Nice atmosphere, great coffee, awesome customer service! Cool gem!Sursa: Google

The place is nicely situated, on top of a little hill in quiet Cotroceni. The coffee was good and came fast. We went on a sunny Sunday morning.Bur that's about it. Don't go here if you want to have brunch. While what's on the menu sounds nice and are well-know recipes, you receive something more appropriate for a side of the road place in deep Romania. The ingredients look as sourced by a hungry student from the corner shop.Everything is served on paper plates (yes, you read that right) and with plastic cutlery. When asked for metal ones, the waitress came back telling me that she didn't know they had themüòÜ.There were 4-5 (special) french breakfast options, all priced 26-29 lei.We ordered french omlettes & croque monsieur but received two slices of disappointment.Sursa: Google

Great place, tasty specialty coffee, delicious food, friendly staff, nice music and large terrace. Many other options to drink such as tea, lemonade, beer, best mulled wine in town and other cocktails.‚òïüç∑ü•Éüçπü•Çüçªü•óüçîüç≥ü§òSursa: Google

Disappointing French menu. The croque madame and croque monsieur had nothing to do with the real thing. Just some slices of bread put on top of one another, with regular pork ham and some cheese (something you would rapidly prepare at home yourself). So why bother going out and eating the same thing you can also make at home? I had high expectations regarding the food, because the previous menu looked delicious in the photos.The bread was toasted, but had no taste whatsoever-French people prepare it with butter in a pan.It was served with French fries, and I doubt that this is the correct side to choose for croque.It's too bad, because the staff was really friendly, place was great, in a beautiful neighbourhood, weather was just fine.Maybe they just need to reconsider their cook.Sursa: Google

title: Tuk Tuk
description: "Tuk Tuk " vƒÉ aduce mancarea de stradƒÉ thailandezƒÉ chiar √Æn centrul gastronomic al Bucure»ôtiului-Doroban»õi.

reviewObj.reviewBody: Wow, gust delicios si chelner super amabil, revenim! Data viitoare sper sa fie chiar toate preparatele din meniu

Am fost pentru prima data la Tuk Tuk si ne-am simtit tare bine. Mancare gustoasa (chicken satay, edamame, tom kha, pad thai), a iesit totul super repede, iar servirea a fost ireprosabila. Au si scaune pt copii. Ne vom intoarce cu siguranta.

Highly recommend the two soups - ingredients were very fresh. Also, the drunken noodles. The red curry was good but came cold and a little too spicy. Service was excellent - very personal & professional. HIGHLY recommend this restaurant for Thai.
Foarte buna mancarea, super servire! Un loc curat si frumos.
Calitatea mancarii a scazut fata de ultima vizita. Cred ca vom alege alt restaurant Thai data viitoare.

reviewObj.reviewBody: Cina delicioasa servita pe terasa, cu incalzitor, cu respectarea normelor impotriva CovidBisque de creveti delicios (insa cam putintel - subiectiv), homar cu tagliatelle foarte bun, icre de stiuca tare bune, tagliatelle cu somon proaspat foarte bunRose de Letea bun
Totul a decurs minunat, mancarea foarte buna, timpul de asteptare foarte scurt.

title: Taqueria El Torito

reviewObj.reviewBody: Atmosfera frumoasa, servirea OK, nu cea mai buna mancare. 3 stele pentru gustul mancarii si pentru faptul ca, desi apar pe site-ul Sodexo, nu au primit tichete de masa.

Mergi aici pentru relaxare si ‚Äúcomfort food‚Äù... mancarea este gustoasa si mai mult dexat suficienta.Preturile sunt ok, la fel si servirea si clientela.Daca nu stii cu ce sa incepu, ia-ti tacos si quesadilla (macheca) si impartiti.
Mancare foarte buna, servirea rapida si super nice, iar terasa e foarte bine aerisita si incalzita
